channel.title: C++ on Volatile Int
channel.description: Recent content in C++ on Volatile Int

item.title: Applying Template Concepts to Tuples in C++
item.description: Learn how to apply and constrain C++20 template concepts to tuple elements with practical examples and idiomatic patterns.

item.title: Introducing Crunch: A Message Definition Protocol for Getting Things Right
item.description: Discover Crunch, a message definition protocol designed for robust serialization and validation in mission-critical communication systems.

item.title: Can You Survive the C++ Auto Type Deduction Gauntlet?
item.description: Test and improve your understanding of C++ auto and decltype(auto) type deduction through a detailed code-based quiz.

item.title: Implementing a Framework For Closed-Loop Controllers in Modern C++
item.description: Build a flexible, modern C++ library for closed-loop control systems that emphasizes abstraction, modularity, and compile-time safety.

item.title: How consteval and constexpr Impact gcov
item.description: Simple examples demonstrating the effect of consteval and constexpr in code coverage analysis
